      • drawCenteredText

        public static int drawCenteredText(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                   org.newdawn.slick.TrueTypeFont font,
                   java.lang.String text,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int width)
        Draw a String centered
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics to draw with
        font - Font to draw the text
        text - The text to center
        x - Left-most position
        y - Vertical position of the text
        width - The available horizontal space to center on
        Returns:
        The vertical position right below the drawn text

      • wrapText

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> wrapText(org.newdawn.slick.TrueTypeFont font,
                                        java.lang.String text,
                                        int width)
        Wrap a long String into smaller Strings, so that each one does not exceed a specified width. Breaks the String on spaces.
        Parameters:
        font - The font which specifies the width of the glyphs
        text - The String to wrap
        width - The available width
        Returns:
        A List containing each line
